entry.title: Blood and Ashes
entry.summary:
Author: lavieboheme0919

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 77,921Chapters: 14/?Kudos: 44

Summary: Several centuries after the Last Battle, the White Tower stands taller than ever—rebuilt, restructured, and reeling from new threats that no one dares name aloud. Saidin has returned, cleansed and chaotic, and the Hall of the Tower seeks control more than balance. When Stiles—a powerful male channeler raised to Aes Sedai—survives a narrow vote in the Hall for flouting Tower law and custom, he’s spared gentling… but not punishment.Bound without consent to Sitters from opposing Ajahs, declared the first Striker since the Age of Legends, Stiles finds himself weaponized by a Tower that fears what it cannot command. But Stiles is not their dog to tame, and the Tower is not as united as it pretends to be. As ancient tensions simmer and forgotten enemies stir, bonds—both sacred and profane—will be tested.This is not the story of the Dragon. This is what comes after.Power without trust. Bonds without love. And one man who will burn down the Pattern before letting them leash him again.Note: There will be some AI-generated art for an important moment from each chapter at the end of each chapter.

entry.title: A Borrowed Sky
entry.summary:
Author: 1223rhys

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 48,189Chapters: 8/23Kudos: 60

Summary: He thought he could outrun his past. After a shootout leaves his gang scattered and the law on his heels, Derek slips into another man’s life—marriage offer and all. But he didn’t expect Stiles: clever, stubborn, and heartbreakingly sincere. And when the past catches up, Derek will have to choose what kind of man he really is—the one he left behind, or the one he’s pretending to be. Marriage was part of the plan. Falling in love wasn’t.

entry.title: Chimera Fox
entry.summary:
Author: sync433

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 42,251Chapters: 21/?Kudos: 275

Summary: While having dinner with his dad. Stiles complains about possible threat that is the Alpha pack. And how he can't find anything about them. Or how he can't find anything on how to better protect them, then what he already has.But their dinner is cut a short, when they get a call about how something strange is happening at one of Beacon Hills sub power stations. Being the closet car, they are the first to respond.What they find will change the pack and their lives forever.

entry.title: Hey, I know that Jeep
entry.summary:
Author: wrappedinwolfsbane (Galileoleo)

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,233Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 48

Summary: In the morning, just outside his shitty motel in the middle of butt-fuck nowhere in shitty northern Utah, Stiles met a kid.Or rather, as he grabbed his still-packed bag, turned in his key, and made his way towards the bus stop out front, Stiles saw a kid—maybe fifteen or sixteen years old, alone, looking positively miserable, sitting on the wall of the little garden bed right in front of the motel. All the plants in it were long dead, but Stiles doubted anyone would ever care about that.His bus was still twenty minutes out, and though all he really wanted was to maybe attempt a quick nap on the bench before then, he was, unfortunately, too much of a nosy bitch—er, too much of an empathetic, nice guy—to keep from wondering about the kid. So, with a great sigh and a heft of his bag on his shoulder, Stiles said fuck it and decided to check on him.~~OR: Teen Wolf Movie fix-it fic.
